content.html: “We really would not have launched 280 when we did without Iku, running around with his charts telling everyone that it would be better,” a person familiar tells me. Fired after 10 years and one late-night “code review”
content.value:
“We really would not have launched 280 when we did without Iku, running around with his charts telling everyone that it would be better,” a person familiar tells me.

Fired after 10 years and one late-night “code review”
